[[PageOutline]]
[[Center(begin)]]
= '''Validation of harmonie-43h2.alpha.1''' =
[[Center(end)]]

This page is a working document for the initial validation of harmonie-43h2.alpha.1. Please check [wiki:Harmonie_43h2/43h2.pre-alpha.1] for the status of cy43.

== Baseline configuration ==

 All experiments are done at ECMWF and based on conventional observations only.

 * harmonie-40h1.1.1 with the following modifications
  * FLAKE,SICE,2-patches, modified tree height
  * VSIQGQSAT=0.03
  * !MetCoOp LISTE_NOIRE_DIAP
  * RCT2SY=10.
  * 'XSODELX(0:1)'      => '1.,2.,',
  * XZ0SN         => '0.003', XZ0HSN        => '0.0003',D95_ZTN_LIMIT => '.TRUE.',

 Copy the settings from ecgb:~snh/hm_home/40h111_mcp.
  
 * release-43h2.alpha.1 with the following modifications
  * FLAKE,SICE,2-patches, modified tree height
  * VSIQGQSAT=0.03
  * !MetCoOp LISTE_NOIRE_DIAP
  * RCT2SY=10.
  * 'XSODELX(0:1)'      => '1.,2.,',
  * XZ0SN         => '0.003', XZ0HSN        => '0.0003',D95_ZTN_LIMIT => '.TRUE.',

 Copy the settings from ecgb:~snh/hm_home/43h2a1_mcp

 We do not use WARMUP_PERIOD since we are likely to find errors quicker if we run longer forecasts. Run a week to start with and then examine the quality before continuing!
